body:
> @mozfreddyb: Do you know which origin should be used in a CSP frame-ancestors to allows about pages to iframe self-repair.mozilla.org ?

Our CSP implementation [gives about: URIs a pass](http://searchfox.org/mozilla-central/source/dom/security/nsCSPService.cpp#77). Are you sure your frmaing page has a proper URL?

On the other hand, if your framing element is a XUL `<browser>`, I'd be surprised if it was suspect to CSP at all.
body_html:
@mozfreddyb: Do you know which origin should be used in a CSP frame-ancestors to allows about pages to iframe self-repair.mozilla.org ?

Our CSP implementation gives about: URIs a pass. Are you sure your frmaing page has a proper URL?

On the other hand, if your framing element is a XUL <browser>, I'd be surprised if it was suspect to CSP at all.
